text: Huilaea is a genus of plants in the family Melastomataceae. Species include: * Huilaea ecuadorensis Wurdack * Huilaea kirkbridei Wurdack * Huilaea macrocarpa L.Uribe * Huilaea minor (L.Uribe) Lozano & N.Ruiz * Huilaea mutisiana L.Uribe * Huilaea occidentalis Lozano & N.Ruiz * Huilaea penduliflora Wurdack ==References== Category:Melastomataceae genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Huilaea
